verbs.description: The Trump administration also [V: is] rumored to be considering Brian Mast among the candidates to replace David Shulkin as Veterans Affairs secretary .
[ARG1: The Trump administration] [ARGM-DIS: also] is [V: rumored] [C-ARG1: to be considering Brian Mast among the candidates to replace David Shulkin as Veterans Affairs secretary] .
The Trump administration also is rumored to [V: be] considering Brian Mast among the candidates to replace David Shulkin as Veterans Affairs secretary .
[ARG0: The Trump administration] also is rumored to be [V: considering] [ARG1: Brian Mast among the candidates to replace David Shulkin as Veterans Affairs secretary] .
The Trump administration also is rumored to be considering [ARG2: Brian Mast] among the candidates to [V: replace] [ARG1: David Shulkin] [ARG2: as Veterans Affairs secretary] .
